ProjectMenstrualClockv2_key2: Apne pichle project mein aapne ek Menstrual Clock banaya tha jisme aap last Period Date aur frequency javascript program mein hi localStorage mein `save` karte the aur baad mein use program mein use karte the. Ye program bas developer (yaani aap) ke liye hi useful tha.
ProjectMenstrualClockv2_key3: Iss project mein hum user se last Period date aur frequency input ke roop mein lenge. Iske liye hum HTML [forms]([200~
ProjectMenstrualClockv2_key6: Apne pichle project ke webpage mein, ek form banayein. Is form mein 2 `input` fields hone chahiye - 1) Date `Input` - Jo user ka last period date le
ProjectMenstrualClockv2_key7: Frequency - jo period dates ki frequency mange (in numbers)
ProjectMenstrualClockv2_key8: Javascript form submit karne par aap `input` fields se user `input` read kar sakte. Sochiye aur Javascript documentation mein khojiye ki iske liye aap kaun se functions use karenge. Aap chahe toh google bhi use kar sakte hain.
ProjectMenstrualClockv2_key9: Read kiye hue `input` fields "`String`" data type honge. Aapko unko "Date" object aur "number" mein convert karna par sakta hai. Documentation mein khojiye ki iske liye kaun se functions ka use kar sakte hain.
ProjectMenstrualClockv2_key10: Read karke aapko in `inputs` ko wapas local storage mein store karna padega. Baanki ka program pehle jaisa hi hoga.
ProjectMenstrualClockv2_key11: Apne program ko run kijiye aur test kijiye  ki wo user-`input` read karkePeriod date approach hone par kisi tarah ka indicator de raha hai. Program ko test karne ke liye aap different `inputs` daal sakte hain aur console.log() use karke har stage pe program debug kar sakte hain.
ProjectMenstrualClockv2_key13: Kya aap apne webpage pe ek countdown counter bana sakte hain jo bataye ki aapke period date aane mein lagbhag kitne din bache hain?
